Hi! My name is Yung-Yu.

I obtained my BA degree in Political Science at [National Taiwan University](https://www.ntu.edu.tw/english/index.html) in 2015 and receieved my Master degree in Public Administration at [National Chengchi University](https://www.nccu.edu.tw/app/home.php) in 2019.

I previously worked as a policy analyst in the [Congress of Taiwan](https://www.ly.gov.tw/Engpages/index.aspx) from 2016 to 2017. Currently, I work as a research assitant at [Institute of Economics, Academia Sinica](http://www.econ.sinica.edu.tw/english).

My full CV is available [here](files/cv_yungyutsai.pdf).
